title: Master Data Analysis with UNIQ Technologies
subtitle: Become a job-ready Data Analyst with UNIQ Technologies. This course covers Excel, SQL, Power BI, Python for Data Analysis, Statistics, Data Cleaning, Dashboarding, and Real-Time Projects. Designed for freshers, graduates, and professionals looking for a high-demand career in data.

afterCompleted.description: Data Analysts are in high demand across IT companies, startups, finance, healthcare, and e-commerce. After completing this course, you can apply for:

faq.question: What is a Data Analysis course?
faq.answer: It is a job-oriented training program that teaches Excel, SQL, Power BI, Python, and Statistics to analyze and visualize data effectively.

faq.question: Do I need technical experience?
faq.answer: No. This course starts from basics and is suitable for freshers and non-IT graduates.

faq.question: Which tools will I learn?
faq.answer: Excel, SQL/MySQL, Power BI, Tableau (intro), Python, Pandas, and data visualization techniques.

faq.question: Is this course good for beginners?
faq.answer: Yes! Many students from B.Com, BBA, Economics, and non-IT branches take this course successfully.

faq.question: Do you provide placement support?
faq.answer: Yes, UNIQ Technologies offers 100% placement support until you get a job.

faq.question: Do we get real-world projects?
faq.answer: Yes. You will work on dashboards, reports, and datasets from finance, sales, HR, and marketing.

faq.question: Can I shift between online and offline classes?
faq.answer: Yes! You can switch anytime at no extra cost.

faq.question: What is the duration of the course?
faq.answer: The course duration is 2â€“3 months depending on the batch.

faq.question: Will I receive certificates?
faq.answer: Yes, both Course Completion and Internship Certificates are provided.

faq.question: Is Data Analysis in demand?
faq.answer: Yes! Every company needs data-driven decision makers, making Data Analysts highly sought-after.
